alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Gallatin; Jefferson; Madison; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:33PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Broadwater, south central Meagher, eastern Madison, southeastern Jefferson and Gallatin Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 633 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Manhattan, or 19 miles northwest of Bozeman, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, West Yellowstone, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Ennis, Pony, Harrison, Big Sky, Targhee Pass, Cameron, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Maudlow, Four Corners, Amsterdam, Jeffers, Trident, Madison Buffalo Jump State Park, Norris and Mcallister. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 269 and 321. Highway 12 between mile markers 104 and 109. Highway 191 between mile markers 5 and 10, and between mile markers 31 and 87. Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 22, between mile markers 2 and 13, near mile marker 19, and between mile markers 24 and 97. Highway 89 between mile markers 39 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for south central, central and southwestern Montana.
